mapper.insert: insert into member ( member_no, id, pw, nickname, name, email, birth, contact, post, address1, address2 ) values ( member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{pw}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{contact}, #{post}, #{address1}, #{address2} )
mapper.select: select nickname from member where member_no = #{memberNo}
select * from member where name = #{name} and birth = #{birth} and contact = #{contact}
select * from member where instr(${column} , #{keyword}) > 0 and role != 'ADMIN' order by ${column} asc , id asc
mapper.update: update member set email = #{email}, post = #{post}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, contact = #{contact} where member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and email = #{email}
select member_no as memberNo, id, nickname, role, point, created_time as createdTime from member order by member_no asc

select member_no as memberNo, id, nickname, role, point, created_time AS createdTime from member
